text: Gananara kayekati dinera jan'ya atahpara tomadera madhye ye, asukha thakabe athaba saphare thakabe, tara pakse an'ya samaye se roja purana kare nite habe. Ara eti yadera jan'ya atyanta kasta dayaka haya, tara era paribarte ekajana misakinake khadyadana karabe. Ye byakti khusira sathe satkarma kare, ta tara jan'ya kalyana kara haya. Ara yadi roja rakha, tabe tomadera jan'ye bisesa kalyanakara, yadi tomara ta bujhate para.
